rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room

rooms.description: A dedicated home office space situated near the entrance hall for privacy, with north or east exposure following Vastu guidelines for intellectual pursuits.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Essential bathroom facilities adjacent to kitchen and living areas. Follows local building codes and Vastu orientation recommendations.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom with natural lighting and ventilation. Placed in accordance with Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Study/Utility Room
